item.title: Takai Simpkins makes TOUGH go-ahead lay-up in Oregon’s 60-59 win over Hawai'i
item.description: Takai Simpkins made a tough, go-ahead lay-up as the Oregon Ducks won 60-59 over the Hawai'i Rainbow Warriors.

item.title: 'They Aren't Very Smart': Matt Painter Defends Fletcher Loyer After 30-Point Opener
item.description: Purdue head coach Matt Painter took a shot at Fletcher Loyer’s doubters after the guard’s 30-point performance against Evansville.
